quest.name: Missing Rider
journal:
Maru looks genuinely worried.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Return the fallen cargo within the time limit.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: We might have trouble, Forename─one of our Riders has gone missin'.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Last we heard from him, he was headin' back here from Palaka's Stand, but that was some time ago.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You think you could spare a moment to join our search? We've covered the ground between here and the Wakeful Torana so far, but beyond that...

dialogue.name: WORRIEDARKASODARA04554
dialogue.text: Oh, blessed be! Someone came lookin'!

dialogue.name: WORRIEDARKASODARA04554
dialogue.text: You won't believe the beast we just ran into. Ugliest thing I've seen since the Final Days...

dialogue.name: WORRIEDARKASODARA04554
dialogue.text: Well, we spanked away like our skins depended on it, but my delivery got jostled outta the cart.

dialogue.name: WORRIEDARKASODARA04554
dialogue.text: To make matters worse, when I pull 'round to fetch it, my wheel slams into a rock, an' now I'm spinnin' six ways to nowhere!

dialogue.name: WORRIEDARKASODARA04554
dialogue.text: My girl was in hippo hysterics─I had to cut her loose to stop her bellowin'. I hate to put you out like this, but you think you could lend me a hand an' bring me my cargo?

dialogue.name: WORRIEDARKASODARA04554
dialogue.text: It's just one wooden crate. I think I spotted it by that boulder over there.

dialogue.name: WORRIEDARKASODARA04554
dialogue.text: Shapin' up to be one of those days, I'm afraid─but knowin' that cargo's safe would make all the difference.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Return the fallen cargo to the harried Rider's cart before your arms give out.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will have three minutes to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.

dialogue.name: WORRIEDARKASODARA04554
dialogue.text: That's it! Thank the Sisters. And you!

dialogue.name: WORRIEDARKASODARA04554
dialogue.text: I'll head home as soon as we're ready to ride. Let Maru know we're alright, will you?

dialogue.name: WORRIEDARKASODARA04554
dialogue.text: I've still gotta check the cart an' coax my girl back under the yoke─tell Maru we'll be on our way shortly, yeah?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: So that's what happened! Thank the Sisters that everyone's alright...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Our Riders are usually pretty good at avoidin' the nastier beasties, but a jungle's still a jungle... Sounds like our carts could use some adjustments, too...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Anyroad, I'll mention it to the boss. Thanks for bein' a pal, Forename.
